ing.item: Pork loin chops; 1 inch thick (1 1/4 to 1 1/2 pounds total)

directions.step:
Preheat the oven to 350F. Brush both sides of the pork chops with the lime juice and place them in a 9" x 13" baking dish that has been coated with nonstick vegetable spray. In a medium-sized bowl, combine the remaining ingredients. Mix until well blended then spoon evenly over the top of the chops. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes, or until cooked through.
NOTE: These can be prepared, covered, and refrigerated overnight before baking. That way, you can put a fancy dinner on the table without having to do any last-minute preparation. (I like that!) Oh, and for a little extra oomph, I sometimes add 1/2 teaspoon dried ground coriander.
